game.name: Nova Defender
game.description:
The time has come when you should try something unique and classy! We are talking about a brand new action-packed game Nova Defender where you will have lots of chances to show off your aggression. In this free online action game, you will have to protect your base against the attack of blood thirsty aliens. They will come in different waves. So, try to keep yourself ready all the time to protect your base in this brutal war. Don’t worry you will have aplenty of weapons to use to defend your base! 

Show off your all hard fighting moves to take on the alien invaders in this fun shooting game! Select your hero and needful weapons since you are looking forward to complete each phase without putting life of your hero at stake! Get ready to gun down all those ugly aliens to save humans and show the world that you are also blessed with a kind heart! Do it fast and join the battle quickly since your base doesn’t have enough time to waste! Click or tap to interact with your enemies!

This is going to be an epic battle since a horde of evil aliens keep coming to you until you finish all of them. Destroy all of them before they begin making a rampage across your base. Help your character to shoot those menacing aliens fast and keep them out of the area! The controls of this HTML5 game is very simple and easy. Enjoy the high definition graphics and have a blast in our all fighting games! Explore our more games that feature outstanding action, thrill and fun!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Nova Defender at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE TO SHOOT THE INCECTS
